duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with the planning and delivering of public recreation activities for hotel guests, including paddle boards, kayaks, bicycles, paddle boats, and fishing.
Conduct orientation class for guests in the use of recreational sporting facilities and safety procedures.
Enforce establishment rules and regulations to maintain discipline in the use of its recreational facilities and ensure safety.
Greet guest arrivals who are participants in planned recreational and sporting activities, introducing them to other participants and explaining facility rules.
Assist the hotel or resort staff in managing the daily operations of recreational facilities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred
